topic.title: Data backed-up using NCC Backup and Restore

body.p: The following is backed-up using NCC Backup and Restore.

ul.li: Alerts and metrics data from prometheus.

body.note: For local backups, by default NCC Backup and Restore uses glusterfs, controlled by volumeType.glusterfs. This can be changed to PVC.
For backup/restore with NETBKUP server, volumeType.glusterfs: must be set to "true".
The helm backup plugin allows to backup at any time and the BrPolicy's .spec.autoEnableCron allows scheduled backups (This option only works when k8swatcher.enabled is true).
